I created a free to use, 3 simple resume templates + cover letter templates. They are easy to edit:

  • Uses Auto Layout;
  • Color Styles;
  • Text Styles;
  • Icons;
  • A4 sheet size;
  • 8-column Layout grid.

There is also an example of a completed resume by template.


I hope this helps in your job search!
